ExampleSentences.Sentence: She covered him with a duvet.
I threw off the duvet and headed for the shower.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Zrzuciłem kołdrę i poszedłem w kierunku prysznica.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: She was sitting on the couch, tucked under the quilt from her bed.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Ona siedziała na kanapie, otulona kołdrą ze swojego łóżka.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: He is completely covered by a very warm comforter.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (On jest całkowicie przykryty bardzo ciepłą kołdrą.)
